title: I want to refund my item but I have no refund left
body:
I was misclicking the buying in the store today and I already use all my 3 refunds long time ago, can I refund this thing I've misclicked?

I misclicked on buying Pool Party Fiora from the home page today, can I refund it?
It's the last RP I got and I won't be able to afford it any time soon and I don't even want to have that skin, it was totally a misclicking and I haven't used it yet.

replies.body:
Is there a way to remove this skin from my account? It hurts my feeling whenever I see it on champion selection, I don't even want RP back now, but I don't want to see this skin on my account.
I just want to remove my pool party fiora skin from my account now.

The refund tokens provided to each account are very limited, and there are currently no methods of obtaining more.  We have a [Refund FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)that provides some more information on how refunds work.  Items can't be transferred or gifted to another account, but it might be possible to remove it by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  

Pool Party Fiora appears just in time for the hot summer!  I hope you might reconsider and smack your foes around with a noodle!
Unfortunately, there are no other ways to refund content.

I was saving it for Project:ashe hope I'll just get enough money when it's on early sale
Is there anyway to gift this thing to someone else instead? I don't even play Fiora and I don't like this skin.
There isn't a way to gift content that you own. :(
